original_text: The king of Arad city lived in the Negev desert. That was in the south part of Canaan. People told him that the Israelites were coming on the road to Atharim. So he attacked the Israelites and he caught some of them.
korean_text: 네겝에 거주하는 가나안 사람 곧 아랏의 왕이 이스라엘이 아다림 길로 온다 함을 듣고 이스라엘을 쳐서 그 중 몇 사람을 사로잡은지라

sentences.original_text: The king of Arad city lived in the Negev desert
sentences.korean_translation: 아라드 성의 왕은 네게브 광야에 살았다

sentences.original_text: That was in the south part of Canaan
People told him that the Israelites were coming
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그에게 이스라엘 사람들이 오고 있다고 알렸다

sentences.original_text: and he caught some of them
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그들 중 일부를 붙잡았다
